entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Victoriaville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:35 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending after midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
